snippet.title: Nightmare House 2 Official Trailer
snippet.description:
We're working on a new horror game! check it out here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m8A-2cKYqWo

...

Released! get it here:
http://nh2.wecreatestuff.com/

A new trailer for the upcoming modification Nightmare House 2.

Nightmare House 2 is a horror mod for Half-life 2 Episode 2, a sequel to the old Nightmare House MapPack from 2005 and it's remake.
For more info go here:
http://nh2.wecreatestuff.com/

Video by TigerboyPT http://www.youtube.com/tigerboypt
Sound and music by Koolfox http://www.youtube.com/Koolfox
You guys are awesome!
